00023         class CompositeMatcher {
00024                 protected $matchers = array();
00025                 private $wasConstructed = false;
00026 
00027                 public function add($matcher) {
00028                         $this->matchers[] = $matcher;
00029                 }
00030 
00031                 public function matches($string, &$value) {
00032                         if(!$this->wasConstructed) {
00033                                 $this->build();
00034                                 $this->wasConstructed = true;
00035                         }
00036                         return $this->match($string, $value);
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 protected function build() {}
00040         }
00041 
00042         class ParallelMatcher extends CompositeMatcher {
00043                 protected function match($string, &$value) {
00044                         $maxLength = false;
00045                         $result = null;
00046                         foreach($this->matchers as $matcher) {
00047                                 $length = $matcher->matches($string, $subvalue);
00048                                 if($maxLength === false || $length > $maxLength) {
00049                                         $maxLength = $length;
00050                                         $result = $subvalue;
00051                                 }
00052                         }
00053                         $value = $this->process($result);
00054                         return $maxLength;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 protected function process($value) {
00058                         return $value;
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062         class SerialMatcher extends CompositeMatcher {
00063                 protected function match($string, &$value) {
00064                         $results = array();
00065                         $total_length = 0;
00066                         foreach($this->matchers as $matcher) {
00067                                 if(($length = $matcher->matches($string, $result)) === false) return false;
00068                                 $total_length += $length;
00069                                 $results[] = $result;
00070                                 $string = substr($string, $length);
00071                         }
00072                         $value = $this->process($results);
00073                         return $total_length;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 protected function process($results) {
00077                         return implode('', $results);
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 
00081         class SimpleSerialMatcher extends SerialMatcher {
00082                 private $return_part_index;
00083 
00084                 public function __construct($return_part_index = 0) {
00085                         $this->return_part_index = $return_part_index;
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 public function process($parts) {
00089                         return $parts[$this->return_part_index];
00090                 }
00091         }

00093         class RegexMatcher {
00094                 private $regex;
00095 
00096                 public function __construct($regex) {
00097                         $this->regex = $regex;
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 public function matches($string, &$value) {
00101                         if(preg_match("/^{$this->regex}/", $string, $matches)) {
00102                                 $value = $this->process($matches);
00103                                 return strlen($matches[0]);
00104                         }
00105                         $value = false;
00106                         return false;
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 protected function process($matches) {
00110                         return $matches[0];
00111                 }
00112         }

00114         class AnnotationsMatcher {
00115                 public function matches($string, &$annotations) {
00116                         $annotations = array();
00117                         $annotation_matcher = new AnnotationMatcher;
00118                         while(true) {
00119                                 if(preg_match('/\s(?=@)/', $string, $matches, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE)) {
00120                                         $offset = $matches[0][1] + 1;
00121                                         $string = substr($string, $offset);
00122                                 }  else {
00123                                         return; // no more annotations
00124                                 }
00125                                 if(($length = $annotation_matcher->matches($string, $data)) !== false) {
00126                                         $string = substr($string, $length);
00127                                         list($name, $params) = $data;
00128                                         $annotations[$name][] = $params;
00129                                 }
00130                         }
00131                 }
00132         }
00133         
00134         class AnnotationMatcher extends SerialMatcher {
00135                 protected function build() {
00136                         $this->add(new RegexMatcher('@'));
00137                         $this->add(new RegexMatcher('[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]+'));
00138                         $this->add(new AnnotationParametersMatcher);
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 protected function process($results) {
00142                         return array($results[1], $results[2]);
00143                 }
00144         }

00148 
00149                 public function __construct($regex, $constant) {
00150                         parent::__construct($regex);
00151                         $this->constant = $constant;
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 protected function process($matches) {
00155                         return $this->constant;

00159         class AnnotationParametersMatcher extends ParallelMatcher {
00160                 protected function build() {
00161                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('', array()));
00162                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('\(\)', array()));
00163                         $params_matcher = new SimpleSerialMatcher(1);
00164                         $params_matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\(\s*'));
00165                         $params_matcher->add(new AnnotationValuesMatcher);
00166                         $params_matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\s*\)'));
00167                         $this->add($params_matcher);
00168                 }
00169         }

00184         class AnnotationValueMatcher extends ParallelMatcher {
00185                 protected function build() {
00186                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('true', true));
00187                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('false', false));
00188                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('TRUE', true));
00189                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('FALSE', false));
00190                         $this->add(new AnnotationStringMatcher);
00191                         $this->add(new AnnotationNumberMatcher);
00192                         $this->add(new AnnotationArrayMatcher);
00193                         $this->add(new AnnotationStaticConstantMatcher);
00194                         $this->add(new NestedAnnotationMatcher);
00195                 }

00225         class AnnotationMorePairsMatcher extends SerialMatcher {
00226                 protected function build() {
00227                         $this->add(new AnnotationPairMatcher);
00228                         $this->add(new RegexMatcher('\s*,\s*'));
00229                         $this->add(new AnnotationHashMatcher);

00233                         $result = parent::match($string, $value);
00234                         return $result;

00238                         return array_merge($parts[0], $parts[2]);

00242         class AnnotationArrayMatcher extends ParallelMatcher {
00243                 protected function build() {
00244                         $this->add(new ConstantMatcher('{}', array()));
00245                         $values_matcher = new SimpleSerialMatcher(1);
00246                         $values_matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\s*{\s*'));
00247                         $values_matcher->add(new AnnotationArrayValuesMatcher);
00248                         $values_matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\s*}\s*'));
00249                         $this->add($values_matcher);
00250                 }

00297         class AnnotationNumberMatcher extends RegexMatcher {
00298                 public function __construct() {
00299                         parent::__construct("-?[0-9]*\.?[0-9]*");
00300                 }
00301 
00302                 protected function process($matches) {
00303                         $isFloat = strpos($matches[0], '.') !== false;
00304                         return $isFloat ? (float) $matches[0] : (int) $matches[0];
00305                 }
00306         }

00309                 public function __construct() {
00310                         parent::__construct("-?[0-9]*");
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 protected function process($matches) {
00314                         return (int) $matches[0];
00315                 }
00316         }

00319                 public function __construct() {
00320                         parent::__construct("'([^']*)'");
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 protected function process($matches) {
00324                         return $matches[1];
00325                 }

00338         class AnnotationStaticConstantMatcher extends RegexMatcher {
00339                 public function __construct() {
00340                         parent::__construct('(\w+::\w+)');
00341                 }
00342 
00343                 protected function process($matches) {
00344                         $name = $matches[1];
00345                         if(!defined($name)) {
00346                                 trigger_error("Constant '$name' used in annotation was not defined.");
00347                                 return false;
00348                         }
00349                         return constant($name);
00350                 }
00351                 
00352         }

00354         class NestedAnnotationMatcher extends AnnotationMatcher {
00355                 protected function process($result) {
00356                         $builder = new AnnotationsBuilder;
00357                         return $builder->instantiateAnnotation($result[1], $result[2]);
00358                 }
00359         }
